title: Corrections & Amplifications
body:
China will reduce coal consumption starting in 2026, Chinese President Xi Jinping said. In some editions Friday, a Page One article about global climate talks and an article about energy considerations in China and India incorrectly said the reduction would start in 2025.
Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by emailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
